TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapDuration extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides static methods for the serialization and deserialization of to a string that is formatted as XSD .

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about XSD data types, see the "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the methods in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDuration> class to convert between a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object and an XSD `duration` string.

Docs.summary: Returns the specified object as a .
Docs.returns: A representation of in the format "PxxYxxDTxxHxxMxx.xxxS" or "PxxYxxDTxxHxxMxxS". The "PxxYxxDTxxHxxMxx.xxxS" is used if does not equal zero.
